cause.description:
On May 17th and May 21st of 2007 the remains of at least three humans were unearthed during the construction of a border zone “Vehicle Barrier” wall. These remains were found buried near the International Border, inside of Tohono O’odham Nation lands in Arizona.
Please Read and Sign this petition to return the Remains http://www.petitiononline.com/reburial/petition-sign.html
1. “Why do these non-O’odham continue to mistreat us? We are humans, we do not go to their [Anglo] graves and dig them up and put them in boxes.”
cause.mission: Demand the Return of Human Remains Unearthed During a Recent Desecration of a Sacred Burial Ground
cause.name: Save the Remains! Petition
